info.title: Reference Data Management API
info.description: The API to manage reference data.

get.description: Retrieve a list of reference data maintenance objects for the requested type.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of reference data.

200.description: OK. The resource has been successfully fetched.

post.description: Create a new reference data maintenance entity.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of reference data.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The reference data maintenance entity payload

get.description: Retrieve a reference data maintenance entity by id.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of reference data.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id that identifies the reference data maintenance entity.

put.description: Update an existing reference data maintenance entity.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of reference data.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id that identifies the reference data maintenance entity.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The reference data maintenance entity payload

delete.description: Delete an existing reference data maintenance entity.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of reference data.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id that identifies the reference data maintenance entity.

post.description: Submit one or more existing reference data maintenance entities for approval.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of reference data.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: A list of reference data maintenance entity ids to submit.

post.description: Approve one or more existing reference data maintenance entities.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of reference data.

parameters.name: ids

post.description: Reject one or more existing reference data maintenance entities.

parameters.name: ids

post.description: Retract one or more existing reference data maintenance entities.

post.description: Withdraw one or more existing reference data maintenance entities.

parameters.description: Type of reference data.

parameters.name: ids
